    • Method Detail

      • getBooksFromLatLong

        List<Book> getBooksFromLatLong(String latitude,
                               String longitude)
                        throws BookNotFoundException
        Gets a List of books from a latitude and a longitude.
        Parameters:
        latitude - String The latitude.
        longitude - String The longitude.
        Throws:
        BookNotFoundException - Exception is thrown if no books are found.

      • getBooksAndCitiesFromAuthor

        List<Book> getBooksAndCitiesFromAuthor(Author author)
                                throws BookNotFoundException
        Returns a List of books an author has written.
        Parameters:
        author - Author The author.
        Returns:
        List of books The books the author has written.
        Throws:
        BookNotFoundException - Exception is thrown if no books are found.

      • getCitiesFromBook

        List<Book> getCitiesFromBook(Book book)
                      throws BookNotFoundException
        Returns a List of books where cities mentioned in a book is in.
        Parameters:
        book - Book The book.
        Returns:
        List of books The books where the cities are mentioned.
        Throws:
        BookNotFoundException - Exception is thrown if no books are found.

      • getAuthorsAndBookFromCity

        List<Book> getAuthorsAndBookFromCity(Location location)
                              throws BookNotFoundException
        Returns a List of books which has a specific location somewhere in the text.
        Parameters:
        location - Location The location that is mentioned.
        Returns:
        List of books The books where the location is mentioned.
        Throws:
        BookNotFoundException - Exception is thrown if no books are found.
